# mapView(_:didAdd:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate when the map view adds one or more annotation views to the map.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func mapView(_ mapView: MKMapView, didAdd views: [MKAnnotationView])
```

## Parameters

- **mapView**: The map view that adds the annotation views.
- **views**: An array of `MKAnnotationView` objects representing the views that the map view adds.

## Discussion

By the time the map view calls this method, MapKit has added the specified views to the map.

## Managing annotation views

- **mapView(_:viewFor:)**: Returns the view associated with the specified annotation object.
- **mapView(_:annotationView:calloutAccessoryControlTapped:)**: Tells the delegate when the user taps one of the annotation view’s accessory buttons.
- **mapView(_:clusterAnnotationForMemberAnnotations:)**: Asks the delegate to provide a cluster annotation object for the specified annotations.
